title: grapefruit scent cleanser by Vérité Skincare, 4 fl. oz. (plastic bottle)
description: 4 oz (118mL) Ingredients: water, coco glucoside, lauryl glucoside, glycerin, citrus grandis (grapefruit) peel oil, xanthan gum, phenoxyethanol (and) caprylyl glycol (and) sorbic acid, citric acid use: apply 1-2 pumps to damp skin, wash, and rinse with warm water if irritation occurs, discontinue use.
